```{r}

q1_reading <-dbReadTable(getReal_2016db, "Q1_reading")


reading_pts <-numeric(0)

for(i in q1_reading$readingGrade){
   
     reading_pts<- c(reading_pts,switch(i, "A" =4, "B"=3, "C"=2, "D"=1, "F"=0, "I"=0))
    
     reading_pts

    
}
```
